SEO_DESCRIPTION: Hire Sandra to create your web or mobile application. Web Developer. Specialized in creating unique applications
HERO_TITLE_SUBTITLE: I have been helping to create web applications since 2016.
SECTION_ABOUT_SUBTITLE: I am a self-taught front-end developer in the city of Arequipa, currently my work is focusing on React.js and Astro
SECTION_SERVICES_SUBTITLE: My goal is to create web applications that offer a unique and personalized digital experience.
SECTION_SERVICES_DEV_DESCRIP: I create unique, custom-coded websites that are tailored to your brand. I focus on scalability, performance, accessibility, and engaging animations for a memorable experience.
SECTION_SERVICES_DESIGN_DESCRIP: I sometimes design user-centric websites that enhance your brand and drive your business goals. Clean typography and minimalist designs.
SECTION_SERVICES_SEO_DESCRIP: In addition to creating visually unique websites, I also optimize their online presence to increase their visibility in search rankings.
SECTION_TWO_SUBTITLE_TWO: I have been working with web technologies for 6 years. During this period I gained hands-on experience with web application development.
